page.title: 13HOUSES
page.content: Mylor is a fairly old village that has some very old houses and some very new houses. We came across one very old house and the man whose family had lived there.He told us that there was a brick factory which the people of Mylor used to go,to make bricks to build houses.The bricks were made out of mud,clay and granite.The family who lived in this house were the Rundells.The modern houses were made of blocks and cement the difference is the new houses are better and stronger so they should stay there longer. Many of the old cottages ,made from granite, had inside wall of cobb (earth).The majority of windows are now made in a large shed belonging to the Barnicoats. Here the window frames are built and the glass put in.
